caption.p: Structures of covalent irreversible cysteine protease inhibitors , which make an alkylation of the active-site cysteine. The reactive epoxysuccinate, vinylsulfone, and allylsulfone segments are colored in red (Fennell et al. 2013; Palmer et al. 1995; Siklos et al. 2015; Zhou et al. 2015)
